itunes:title: Episode 405 - Charlie Classic is BACK!
title: Episode 405 - Charlie Classic is BACK!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are joined by fan favorite storyteller, Charlie Classic. Charlie and the guys discuss the state of porn in today's world, a hypothetical reboot of a superhero flick called "Baggy Batman", and how to make an...
itunes:summary:
Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are joined by fan favorite storyteller, Charlie Classic. Charlie and the guys discuss the state of porn in today's world, a hypothetical reboot of a superhero flick called "Baggy Batman", and how to make any movie better by replacing one lead character with Hooch.... the dog from the Tom Hanks movie "Turner and Hooch".

Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are joined by fan favorite storyteller, Charlie Classic. Charlie and the guys discuss the state of porn in today's world, a hypothetical reboot of a superhero flick called "Baggy Batman", and how to make any movie better by replacing one lead character with Hooch.... the dog from the Tom Hanks movie "Turner and Hooch".
